mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LECTURE_FILE (LECTURE_FILE_NUMBER, LECTURE_FILE_NAME, LECTURE_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, LECTURE_FILE_UUID, LECTURE_FILE_SIZE, LECTURE_FILE_CHECK, LECTURE_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_LECTURE_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{lectureFileName}, #{lectureFileUploadPath}, #{lectureFileUuid}, #{lectureFileSize}, #{lectureFileCheck}, #{lectureNumber})
